Opal Images Inc. Video Production & Steadicam

I run and manage Opal Images Inc., an Emmy award winning Production Company and a leader in providing high-end video production. We offer complete turnkey video production solutions to our clients both local and national. We produce commercials, TV shows and corporate videos with a reputation for quality.  My job is to quickly understand the client’s  needs through the use of collaboration skills at an executive level to acquire and maintain our clients. I organize a matrix of skill sets to accomplish the desired outcome at a high level. I work well were I am in complete control of a project or I can work as a member of the team. See video samples of our work.  http://vimeo.com/opalimages

Editmax was created when Opal Images’ Post production division took on new partners to service a $4 Million dollar contact with the Mexican Government in tourism video production. I managed the creative staff of editors. I marketed, designed and built this facility. It was the first in the Phoenix Metro area with the Quantel Edit Box and later 3 Avids. My marketing efforts created an alliance with Avnet to build The Avnet Corporate Broadcast center with Editmax as its editing provider.  Clients included Movies like Warner Brothers' Mightly Kong, Fox's Anastasia, Bartok. and James Archer's Screaming Metal. Commercials for Terris Consign & Design, SRP, Arizona Lottery, Oxi Clean Long & Short Format. Etc. Corporate Clients included Dell Computers, Daifuku, IBM, Intel and Avnet.
San Antonio, Texas  and Phoenix, Arizona

Project Manager over a ten year period. The company won high praise from the Mexican Government, 1 Emmy, 13 Tellys and 2 Addy’s I Produced and was the Director of Photography on Mexico Tourism Projects for Sector's Advertising Agencies; The Atkins Group, San Antonio TX & Burson Marsteller, NY. This project included the award winning Tours of Mexico, Hotels, City Marketing Videos and for Tours of Mexico alone among many.

I built and designed JHT Productions from the ground up and managed it's Production and Post Production into one of Phoenix's largest facilities. Under my leadership, it went from start-up to 2 million a year in less than 3 years. The company produced and/or edited local and national commercials, TV shows and high-end corporate videos. I also produced its in-house TV Fishing shows and infomercials.

I created a Fishing show, which aired on KUSK TV, to serve the needs of local outdoor focused advertisers. The show’s following helped it grow to be seen throughout the Southwest. It last aired on CBS channel 5 for a year. It surprised all of us that it lasted ten years on the air, mostly in reruns, and it always won the male 18+ demo.  I was responsible for sponsorships, product placement, syndication, and product development.

It was very rewarding to work on the Board. Preforming weigh-ins, setting up the fields, Supervising the the games and going to Championships. It was all about the kids and it was great to watch them grow!
